Things I've Made

These are some of the things I've made they include things like website tools, HTML Templates, and websites designs.

Pricing Calculator

A website pricing calculator that estimates the price of a website project based on few simple questions. How many pages does your website have? What level of design will you want for you website? how responsive do you want your website to be?

Figma Templates

A collection of Figma Templates I've Made over the last year. Here you can find interface designs ranging from mobile to desktop covering a range of designs dentistry to photography.

Website Information

Learn More About Websites and Web Development: A Guide to Designing, Building, and Enhancing Your Online Presence. What is a website? How to get traffic to your website? What is WordPress? & More.

HTML Template

This is an HTML Landing Page Template That I designed and coded. My aim with this landing page was to offer developers a quick solution for throwing up a landing page. Some of the features in this landing page are a auto hero image slide and a contact form powered by FormSpree.

Switching My Website Over From Jekyll to 11Ty

Part of the reason I moved over from Jekyll to 11ty was the Build time. While Jekyll is really good for smaller websites it starts falling on it's face as the website gets bigger
